imgui.internal.flag

Class ImGuiItemFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • imgui.internal.flag.ImGuiItemFlags

  • public final class ImGuiItemFlags
extends java.lang.Object
    Transient per-window flags, reset at the beginning of the frame. For child window, inherited from parent on first Begin(). This is going to be exposed in imgui.h when stabilized enough.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ButtonRepeat
      Button() will return true multiple times based on io.KeyRepeatDelay and io.KeyRepeatRate settings.
      static int Disabled
      [BETA] Disable interactions but doesn't affect visuals yet.
      static int MixedValue
      [BETA] Represent a mixed/indeterminate value, generally multi-selection where values differ.
      static int NoNav 
      static int NoNavDefaultFocus 
      static int None 
      static int NoTabStop 
      static int ReadOnly
      [ALPHA] Allow hovering interactions but underlying value is not changed.
      static int SelectableDontClosePopup
      MenuItem/Selectable() automatically closes current Popup window
